scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:AuditPanel_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($auditListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('auditList')) #set ($searchInputId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('searchInput')) #set ($memberSearchInputId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('memberSearchInput')) #set ($machineNamesId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('machineNames')) #set ($auditActionsId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('auditActions')) #set ($auditSourcesId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('auditSources')) #set ($auditCountId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('auditCount')) #set ($headerTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('listHeaderTemplate')) #set ($initialStartDate = $core_v2_utility.CurrentUserDate.AddDays(-7))
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('tab-auditing.vm')
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('tab-archive.vm')
#registerClientTemplate($headerTemplateId)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Tab_Auditing')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Tab_Archive')
#end #registerEndOfPageHtml('auditPanel') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end

The available audit archives are listed below.</resource> <resource name="as">as</resource> <resource name="AuditPanel_Description">View platform audit actions.</resource> <resource name="AuditPanel_Name">Auditing</resource> <resource name="between">that occurred between</resource> <resource name="byanymember">by any member</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="containing">containing</resource> <resource name="Export">Export as CSV</resource> <resource name="ExportAll">Export as CSV</resource> <resource name="from">from</resource> <resource name="Instructions">Below is a listing of actions occurring throughout the site.</resource> <resource name="Instructions_WithAuditDateRange">Below is a listing of actions occurring throughout the site.
